author: dennisl
msg: Add an IT that covers a similar case to the one in the unit test I just fixed. I used this to test the proper behavior of simultaneous includes and excludes in a fileset.

author: kschenk
msg: Some formatting changes and elaboration on RTC.

author: dennisl
msg: Fix broken test code, that was made apparent when adding license headers to the text files. The old helper method did not test for the number of files in a directory, but rather the number of bytes in a directory. With only empty files it reported 0 (bytes), even though there were files available. This also pointed out an error in the test method itself, which was testing for the wrong condition.
